alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 12 at 2:14PM MDT until June 12 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 214 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Truckton, or 32 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Yoder, Truckton and Rush. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
